Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Josie Hughes. Author.

  • Sarah Endicott. Author, maintainer.

  • Yuko Shimoda. Author.

  • Craig Simpkins. Author.

  • Tati Michelleti. Author, copyright holder.
    Functions getCoefs and sampleRates are derived from code written by Tati Micheletti

  • Eliot McIntire. Author.

  • Saralees Nadarajah. Copyright holder.
    Author of truncdist package, which function rtrunc and qtrunc were modified from

    Author of truncdist package, which function rtrunc and qtrunc were modified from
